epworth_01.Description: How likely are you to doze off and fall asleep, Sitting and reading

epworth_02.Description: How likely are you to doze off and fall asleep, Watching TV

epworth_03.Description: How likely are you to doze off and fall asleep, Sitting, inactive in a public place (e.g. a theatre or a meeting)

epworth_04.Description: How likely are you to doze off and fall asleep, As a passenger in a car for an hour without a break

epworth_05.Description: How likely are you to doze off and fall asleep, Lying down to rest in the afternoon when circumstances permit

epworth_06.Description: How likely are you to doze off and fall asleep, Sitting and talking to someone

epworth_07.Description: How likely are you to doze off and fall asleep, Sitting quietly after a lunch without alcohol

epworth_08.Description: How likely are you to doze off and fall asleep, In a car, while stopped for a few minutes in the traffic
